Articles.Content:
I didn't think of that...

yeah i just thought of that as well

but yesterday at 12-ish my time is when he said this afternoon, which could imply he was already in afternoon when he said it.

I may just be being a wee bit overanalytical though
Infinite will it be released today, and don't delay it unless you find a game breaking bug, we dont care about small bugs as long as it is still playable.
The wait is killing me.

Infinite will it be released today, and don't delay it unless you find a game breaking bug, we dont care about small bugs as long as it is still playable.

it's planned to be released today, the only way i think he said it wouldn't come is if the game gets updated

edit: just checked the post, and I'm very certain it's coming today.

Edited March 15, 2014 by Jordanpumah
woo hoo thanks for the info. does anyone no a specific time of release?
are you sure its almost 3:30.

could you invite the rest of us when that server's ready?

Yes! I want to be on this server! I specialize in chaotic military creations!

@hellbrand: i have pacific time, and you cant get much later that that; it will most likely be in the day for me (yay). (notice the word "much,")

I've been preparing ever since i saw the mod, because i love replicating real stuff, especially wwii, so firespitter stuff shoots the appropriate targets. warning: contains images

Stuka dive-bomber

empty bomb mount thingy

Shimakaze destroyer

Rotatrons without guns

G10N bomber (this was never built, but there were blueprints. it was to fly during wwii from Japan, bomb the US, land at Germany to refuel and reload bombs, then turn around for another run)

Empty bomb bay

Panzer III tank; without cannon

what I have been doing in the past, it was very impractical, and in my opinion, riduculous

Yes! I want to be on this server! I specialize in chaotic military creations!

I specialize in blowing things up, but now i can specialize in blowing things up that aren't myself!
Time to prepare for the shelling of Airport Island

Time to prepare for the shelling of Airport Island

gonna set up some civilians right now!
I might go 'retire' some aircraft there.

Time to prepare for the shelling of Airport Island

or kamikaze the island. I'm working on an MXY-7, but i have no idea how to get the bombs in there

~snip~

Nice stuka, maybe with some clever sound editing the diving sound would be possible.

Good meteor as well, the engine nacelles need to be lowered a bit.
You could just part clip it inside a fuel tank, and then go from there, also, thanks for giving me an idea
its 3:30 pacific time! maybe he's in hawaii

you could hollow out the plane, which would make it bigger, and put the hardpoints in there, but the Ohka was a tiny sonofagun.

clipping would probably be your best bet, or maybe the smallest b9 cargo bay?

This is just my 2 cents, but it seems strange to me that people get a game called 'Kerbal SPACE Program' and then do nothing but build airplanes and boats and ground vehicles.

Just an observation, not intended as criticism.

This is just my 2 cents, but it seems strange to me that people get a game called 'Kerbal SPACE Program' and then do nothing but build airplanes and boats and ground vehicles.

Just an observation, not intended as criticism.

But just think about minecraft. It's about mining and building yet lots of people add in things like nuclear reactors, magic wands, rockets, computers, etc. through mods

you could hollow out the plane, which would make it bigger, and put the hardpoints in there, but the Ohka was a tiny sonofagun.

clipping would probably be your best bet, or maybe the smallest b9 cargo bay?

I've made it, but i had to use shrouds from procedural fairings (sort of cheating). The hardest part was getting it under a G4M, cause there isn't a part size between normal and probe parts, and you cant make that weird indention on the bottom of the G4M. The real question is if bombs will explode if they aren't detacthed from the pylons, if you watched Infinite dice's video u know what I mean. PS the smallest b9 cargo bay is an elliptical shape, and the next smallest is as wide as the bomber carrying it.

I specialize in blowing things up, but now i can specialize in blowing things up that aren't myself!

Yes! Previously all I could do was fancy switching to let me shoot myself down! (Oh, the strange minds of military KSP players.)

This is just my 2 cents, but it seems strange to me that people get a game called 'Kerbal SPACE Program' and then do nothing but build airplanes and boats and ground vehicles.

Just an observation, not intended as criticism.

I build rockets, but 75% are based of real rockets, and 20% are sci-fi. The 5% left are my inventions that actually work, which isn't that much
should I post a picture of my okha, or u think its getting off-topic enough for a new thread?
when is the release

Good meteor as well, the engine nacelles need to be lowered a bit.

The firespitter jet produces thrust straight out, while the actual engine is angled upward. it was meant more for MiG 15's and F-86's, so the meteor engines looks like that. now that you think of it, a Kikka or Me 262 would work with those nacelles in the same spot
